title: How to Clear Fault Code F7 on a Dyson Cr01 Washing Machine

steps.headline: Switch off the power using the 'MAINS ON/OFF' button.
Carry out the next three steps within 3 seconds.
Check that a message similar to "DIAGNOSTIC MODE 123F7F2F5V127" is displayed.
steps.description: If it is not, repeat from the beginning.

steps.headline: Switch on the power.
steps.description: The fault code should have cleared.

text: Switch off the power using the 'MAINS ON/OFF' button.  Press and hold the 'Temperature' button.  Carry out the next three steps within 3 seconds.  Switch on the power.  Release the 'Temperature' button.  Press the 'Soil type' button.  Check that a message similar to "DIAGNOSTIC MODE 123F7F2F5V127" is displayed. If it is not, repeat from the beginning. Switch off the power.  Switch on the power. The fault code should have cleared.
